name: Arcade Boss
description:
Game Made For The VimJam2.

------------------------------------------------------------------

Story: 

You Are A Gamer.

Your On The Edge Of Getting The Best High Scores Possible.

Can You Do It?

Only One Way To Find Out.

------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Enter - Start Game

Backspace - Return To Main Screen

WSAD Or Arrow Keys - Movement

M - Mute/Unmute Music

N - Mute/Unmute Sound Effects

Extra Frog Controls:

E Or Right Control - Eat Flies / Shoot Flies.

Extra Galaga Controls:

W Or Up Arrow - Shot Bullets

------------------------------------------------------------------

Check Me Out On Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/asodiacvoby

And Yea, That Is All The Social Platfroms I Have.

Hope You Enjoy!
